review_details: The view,amazing,if you stay in the front,the food ok,staff poor,we wanted to make a reservation but they told us is no need,when we arrived,all the tables with a view were reserved.
If you do not know much about fishing,it's ok overall but if you expect some jigging action or some lure fishing,big down,big.The price is huge too.
Year after year,the serving left to be desired,from bad to worst,food is good,but you leave with a "bad taste"
The poorest service and food.It was cold also.The waiter messed up our order for three times.Other people sitting next to us complaind also about the food.In a few words,just avoid !
The worst services I have seen in a while.The food is good but it doesn't matter because after a service like that you don't feel much like eating
